mapper.insert:
insert into game_info ( game_id, game_name, game_type, game_type_name, game_factory_type, game_factory_type_name, game_abstract_type, game_abstract_type_name,update_time ) values
( #{param.gameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.gameTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.gameFactoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.gameFactoryTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.gameAbstractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.gameAbstractTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update.foreach: update game_info set game_name = #{item.gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, game_type = #{item.gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, game_type_name = #{item.gameTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, game_factory_type = #{item.gameFactoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, game_factory_type_name = #{item.gameFactoryTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, game_abstract_type = #{item.gameAbstractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, game_abstract_type_name = #{item.gameAbstractTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where game_id = #{gameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
